name: How much do you know about 'Mystery Men'? | Quiz

questions.text: Who are the trio of good guys?
questions.correct: Mr. Furious, Blue Raja, The Shoveler
options: The Shoveler, Blue Raja, Death Man
Mr. Furious, Captain Amazing, Captain America
Mr. Furious, The Shoveler, Blue Rocker
questions.explanation: Mr. Furious, Blue Raja, The Shoveler

questions.text: Who is the actor who plays Captain Amazing?
What are the names of the two disco boys?
After the group of three see the disco boys and Mr. Furious wants to follow them but The Shoveler and Blue Raja say they have to go home what does Mr. Furious call them?
questions.explanation:
Lazy Boy and The Recliner.

	This part is so funny.

questions.text: Where does The Sphinx fight crime?
questions.explanation:
Down South.

	The Shoveler says that the Sphinx is a big crime fighter from down South.

questions.text: What does The Bowler have inserted in her bowling ball?
What was The Bowler's father's profession?
At first what does Mr. Furious tell the waitress his name is after he walks her home?
questions.explanation:
Phoenix Dark.

	He says his name is Phoenix Dark before he tells her his real name which is Roy.

questions.text: When everyone is in the armored vehicle and they are trying to get Mr. Furious mad what is an insult that IS NOT said?
options: You dress like a male prostitute

questions.text: At the end of the movie how many people are on the 'super team'?
questions.explanation:
7.

	There is Mr. Furious, The Shoveler, Blue Raja, The Sphinx, The Bowler, The Spleen, and Invisible Boy.
